pages.text: Iris Out allows Ravenous Maw to launch homing or ordinary projectiles called Iris Bullets. These bullets apply other Mutation effects. In order to launch a homing bullet toggle the configuration option and fully charge the maw before the launch (when you heard the sound it is fully charged).
Iris Out prioritizes the mobs closest to your cursor and can't be locked on the mobs behind you or you can't see.
